titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King & Queen at White-Hall, March the twelfth, 1689/90, being the fast-day by the Bishop of St. Asaph, Lord Almoner to Their Majesties.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of St. Asaph's sermon before the King and Queen on the fast-day.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
